definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Add a retaining ring feature to the selected shaft section.
sentences.chinese: 將釦環特徵加入至選取的軸剖面。

sentences.english: Rings shall vanish from our noses.
Place baby into the carrier and attach the fastenings and buckles.
sentences.chinese: 發生嬰兒到承運人和重視的緊固件和釦環。

sentences.english: If that retaining ring is misaligned, a bullet could conceivably jam in the barrel.
sentences.chinese: 如果釦環沒有位移子彈會堵塞在槍桶裏。

sentences.english: They can meet the requirements of wheel tyre retaining rings of different models of locomotives for rolling.
sentences.chinese: 該機能滿足不同型號機車輪箍釦環滾壓的要求。

sentences.english: I had one of my students bring me a cotton lead rope with a bull snap on one end.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個學生，幫我帶了一條一端附有釦環的粗棉繩。
